scripts.build:prod:ngsw: npm run build:prod && npm run ngsw
scripts.server_start: npm run server_build && npm run server_watch
scripts.server_build: npm run server_build-sass && npm run server_build-ts && npm run server_tslint && npm run server_copy-static-assets
scripts.server_watch: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Sass,TypeScript,Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run server_watch-sass" "npm run server_watch-ts" "npm run server_serve"
scripts.server_debug: npm run server_build && npm run server_watch-debug
scripts.server_watch-debug: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Sass,TypeScript,Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run server_watch-sass" "npm run server_watch-ts" "npm run server_serve-debug"
